title: Engineer Portal
subtitle: CHoRUS Azure Data Enclave

The CHoRUS Engineer Portal currently offers a small collection of tools and services.

- Check **[Ares](/ares/)** to characterize data and assess data quality.
- Use **[Atlas](/atlas/)** to conduct scientific analyses.
- Open your own personal **[Jupyter Lab](/lab/)** to write code in Python, and R.
